summary: A man picked randomly out of a crowd is made the target of CIA survelliance and pursuit.
cast: Tom Hanks|Dabney Coleman|Lori Singer|Charles Durning|Carrie Fisher|Edward Herrmann|Jim Belushi|Irving Metzman|Tom Noonan|Gerrit Graham|David L. Lander|Ritch Brinkley|Frank Hamilton|Dortha Duckworth|David Ogden Stiers|Julius Carry|Stephen Bradley|Art LaFleur|Richard McGonagle|George Martin|Patricia Gaul|Charles Levin|Dan Resin|Tom Rayhall|Victoria Carroll|Mark Robman|Charles Walker|David Selburg|Lisa Raggio|Ivy Bethune|Richard Clark|Tom Chiu|Damita Jo Freeman|Jeff Ware|Noel De Souza|Dan Ziskie|Sam Sako|Pamela Clay|Joe Dooley|Jack Larravide|Stan Rodarte
title: El hombre con un zapato rojo
